description: Gets an endpoint for a specified stream for either reading or writing. Use this endpoint in your application to read from the specified stream (using the GetMedia or GetMediaForFragmentList operations) or write to it (using the PutMedia operation). In the request, specify the stream either by StreamName or StreamARN.

parameters.name: APIName
parameters.description: The name of the API action for which to get an endpoint.

nested_items.name: DataEndpoint
nested_items.description: The endpoint value. To read data from the stream or to write data to it, specify this endpoint in your application.
